alert.note: Alert for Greene (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 2:28PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Greene County through 300 PM CDT... At 228 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Willard, or 7 miles northwest of Springfield. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Willard, Ash Grove, Brookline, Glidewell, Cave Springs and Bois D`arc. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 62 and 68, and between mile markers 70 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
